data.title: A Man Called Sledge | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase A Man Called Sledge on digital and stream instantly or download offline. This brisk, action-packed Western stars Garner and Weaver as outlaw buddies who break into a maximum-securtiy prison in order to steal a half-million dollars worth of gold. The robbery a success, greed soon turns them against one another, culminating in a spectacular, blazing showdown in a small Mexican village.
data.text:
This brisk, action-packed Western stars Garner and Weaver as outlaw buddies who break into a maximum-securtiy prison in order to steal a half-million dollars worth of gold. The robbery a success, greed soon turns them against one another, culminating in a spectacular, blazing showdown in a small Mexican village.
